American women’s soccer didn’t just rise—it soared. From the iconic 1999 World Cup win to their unmatched success on the global stage, the U.S. Women’s National Team (USWNT) has become a powerhouse in sports and a symbol of equality and perseverance. But how did it all happen?

 

This interactive website takes you on a journey through the history and triumphs of American women’s soccer. You’ll dive into key moments like the game-changing impact of Title IX, and the team’s fight for equal pay. Through dynamic visuals and engaging storytelling, we’ll unpack how the USWNT became a global phenomenon, inspiring generations and changing the game forever.

 

Explore the stats, relive the highlights, and get a closer look at the players and milestones that shaped this incredible legacy. Whether you’re a lifelong fan or just curious about the story, this is your front-row seat to the rise of American women’s soccer.
